replies.body:
Hello, hello! 

We're working on a fix! Thanks for the report. :)
SWEET!  Thanks for the quick response KateyKhaos!!!

Also her Q coming out of her ult is delayed on hit. Ult then stand on top of minnions and Q. Its not like it was before the patch. So you cant Q out of your ult anymore. You have to end your ult with an AA and then Q to get the proper hit box with no delay.
Shoot, I wish I would have seen this today.  Sorry Riot for the extra ticket on this, but it does make me sad that this amazing skin is bugged :(

Yeah this is rather annoying, just bought this skin for the nice visuals and then i get a bugged recall... Also her ultimate is sometimes bugged (not always). Sometimes you end up on top of Valor instead of her picking Quinn up.
